dct_description_sm: descritte da Thomaso Porcacchi da Castiglione Arretino e intagliate da Girolamo Porro Padovano ...
Trapezoidal projection on some maps; and some contain geographical numbers along margins, with linear parallels indicated at sides.
Index: Tavola della cose piu notabili contenute in questo libro dell' isole.
Last page blank (included in page description).
Engraved title page; head and tail-pieces throughout.
Maps show topography, vegetation, waterways, shoals, ports.
Illustrations of settlements (e.g. Map 1), fauna (e.g. Map 3), ships, sea monsters.
Map 16 shows bird's eye view of Venice; Map 33 of Constantinople; Map 37 of Temistitan.
Map 47 is a nautical map of the world.
